about_the_game:
This DLC includes acces to a new, diary about the founder of fungames in the production of the game.
You can see how we did, how we figured out each step, and what our mindset was at that time. We are verry excited on sharing our journey with you.

This DLC, is meant for you that wants to know how we made the game "Shopping Simulator". Otherwise this DLC is meant for support, and supports us verry much.
detailed_description:
This DLC includes acces to a new, diary about the founder of fungames in the production of the game.
You can see how we did, how we figured out each step, and what our mindset was at that time. We are verry excited on sharing our journey with you.

This DLC, is meant for you that wants to know how we made the game "Shopping Simulator". Otherwise this DLC is meant for support, and supports us verry much.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Q9450 @ 2.6GHz - AMD Phenom II X6 @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 - AMD Radeon 7750 - Intel A310
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Q9450 @ 2.6GHz - AMD Phenom II X6 @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080ti - AMD Radeon Rx Vega 64 - Intel A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: Our game Shopping Simulator, was made by 8 people, with this DLC you will get acces to a diary of the founder, that was made in the whole production of the game, so you are able to come behind the seens.
